name: UAV
description:
Please Read: This is unfinished prototype.

The main game concept is ready and finalaized but  the core game loop isn't implemented yet.

Nevertheless, the jam gave us a great push to reanimate old game draft, port it to UE5 and build a new workflow around it.

In terms of game design, the closest references gonna be StarFox for N64 🦊

Please, stay tuned for further updates.

At the current state build contains only basic flying mechanics with WASD (keyboard)

UAV-build-0.13.zip 1.6 GB

Devs: Vitalii Zavoloka and Mykhailo Novoseltsev
